title: Tabular Data Viewer Extension
description: Settings for the Tabular Data Viewer Extension. Supports Parquet, Excel, CSV, and TSV files.

enableParquet.title: Enable Parquet files
enableParquet.description: Use this extension to view .parquet files

enableExcel.title: Enable Excel files
enableExcel.description: Use this extension to view .xlsx files

enableCSV.title: Enable CSV files
enableCSV.description: Use this extension to view .csv files

enableTSV.title: Enable TSV files
enableTSV.description: Use this extension to view .tsv files
